title: Kburn2201
author: Kburn2201
created_time: October 18, 2023, 07:29:55 PMLast edit: October 18, 2023, 08:37:14 PM by Kburn2201
content: I’m desperately. I lost the contents of my storage unit to auction and it contained my entire life.  I’m working as much as I can to get enough $ to buy my stuff back! Had to hire someone to get the info from the company.  I am looking for a $2,500 short-term loan with 10% interest to be paid back in full 30 days from date loan is madeLoan Amount: 2,500.00 USDTLoan Purpose: Urgent and PersonalLoan Repay Amount: $2,750.00Loan Repay Date: 30 days from loan dateType of Collateral: I don't have much for collateral except my car Thank you!

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You will not get a loan here without the proper collateral. Users don't just hand out free money to anyone who asks. You have nothing to lose, and nothing to make you repay a loan if anyone was dumb enough to hand you the money. Your story also makes me question you. You have no money, but hired someone to get you info? Info on what? Who bought the storage unit? You cannot pay for your storage monthly(which costs less than $100 monthly normally), but in 30 days you will have $2500+interest LMAO. Cmon man.You mention you have a car, but how will a lender get your car to hold from you?

comments.author: Kburn2201
comments.body: There’s no need to be snotty, but at least you responded.  All valid questions. First, I hired a hacker to get the name of the person who bought my storage. Now, I have to pay what buyer paid plus some of what he would have profited if sold just  to get it back…$2,000.Second, I had saved up money to take off work for one month to another state to take care of him for a month after back surgery, but he canceled it.Third, I did have the money to pay storage, but they told me I had until 10/13 and it auctioned on the 10/11.Fourth, I have no idea how this works or what is needed for “collateral”.  I do have enough sense to know no one wants my car as collateral.  Just being honest.  As far as property, I don’t have much anyone would accept.Fifth, I did have money and I used that money that I had saved to pay off a couple of old medicalBills to get them off my credit report.  That didn’t hurt my credit as much as I don’t have a history over the past 4 years as I’ve not worked.  I took care of my Mother.  I’m punished for not taking out credit that I couldn’t pay back.  Stupid.Last, I bring in $3500 a month and I have less than $500 in bills and those are paid through December 1.  So, yes I can pay it back.   I’d be too afraid to screw over someone anyway.  I’m just grasping for straws, dude.  I have no other options and it sucks.  I can pay a loan but I can’t damn get one the normal way. 🤷🏼‍♀️

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: TBH nobody is going to lend money to a new account without any reputation.You may start toreading  this next topics:[EDU] EXERCISE CAUTION WHEN LENDING TO USERS![EDU] The Rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" - IGNORE AT YOUR OWN RISK!
